text: Charbonnières-les-Sapins is a former commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. On 1 January 2017, it was merged into the commune of Étalans.Arrêté préfectoral 12 August 2016 == References == Category:Former communes in Doubs
title: Charbonnières-les-Sapins
